row.entry: Color contrast filter changes the contrast between green versus magent and blue versus yellow.

sect4.title: Usage
sect4.para: Higher values increase color contrast, lower values decrease it. The effect of this module is similar to a steepened or flattened a- or b-curve in module tonecurve (see ).

sect5.title: green vs. magenta
sect5.para: Changes color contrast for green versus magenta.

sect5.title: blue vs. yellow
sect5.para: Changes color contrast for blue versus yellow.
